code:
flowchart TD
START([START]) -->
ReadN[/Read n/] -->
Assign[i = 1] -->
Loop{i <= n}
  Loop -- False --> End(["End"])
  Loop -- True --> Check{n % i == 0?}
    Check -- False --> Increment
    Check -- True --> Print[/"Print i"/]
    --> Increment[i = i + 1]
    --> Loop
